articles.author: Amber Marie
articles.title: Coordinator Hot Board 1.0: Who could James Franklin tap as his new OC and DC? - 247Sports
articles.description: Now that James Franklin has been announced has Virginia Techs football coach who could he hire as his offensive and defensive coordinators We take a look at some leading names below
articles.content: It has been two days since news broke that Virginia Tech is hiring James Franklin as the new head football coach of the Hokies. Since then, Franklin has started a recruiting blitz to assemble a class… [+414 chars]
